welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Boultham, where history and culture come alive. Known for its beautiful architecture and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience our lovely city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humaita Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humberside International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Humberside International Airport handles freight and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Nottingham Airport is reserved for VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
